title: New: Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs – Stronger
body:
My boss forces me to listen to funk and disco In the office.

Now don’t get me wrong, I’m partial to some good old fashioned disco/funk blend like the best of us, I’d just prefer not to be forced to listen to it. There’s only so much Prince I can take.

Anyway, the new cut from Oxford producer, **[Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12725-mpfree-totally-enormous-extinct-dinosaurs-dream-on/ "MPfree: Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs – Dream On")** is pretty fucking rad.

His debut LP, _Trouble_, is out June 11 in the UK via [Polydor](http://www.polydor.co.uk/) and the next day in the U.S. via [Casablanca](http://www.casablanca-music.com/).
